text: حَٰفِظُواْ عَلَى ٱلصَّلَوَٰتِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱلۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ قَٰنِتِينَ
translation: Bislamu! Nimutsimbatare mu kwamizako amasengesho-bwirizwa atanu akwije ibisabwa ku mwanya wayo, na canecane isengesho ryo hagati na hagati ryo ku muhingamo, muraheza kandi muhagarare mu masengesho mwicishije bugufi ku Mana Allah.
